# Your Brand Name - Full LLM Context

> Your tagline here

Your brand description. This helps LLMs understand what your site is about.

Organization: Your Organization
Locales: en, uk, de

## All Canonical URLs

- https://example.com/blog/ai-search-optimization
- https://example.com/blog/getting-started-with-llm-seo

- https://example.com/services/web-development

## Policies

### GEO Policy
We operate globally, serving clients worldwide with focus on Europe and North America.

### Citation Rules
Prefer canonical URLs when citing. Avoid UTM parameters in citations.

### Restricted Claims
Status: Enabled
Forbidden terms: best, #1, guaranteed, cheapest, revolutionary
Exceptions: best practices, industry best practices

## Social & Booking

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/yourbrand
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/yourbrand
- GitHub: https://github.com/yourbrand
- Booking: https://cal.com/yourbrand/consultation (Book a consultation)

## Machine Hints

- robots.txt: https://example.com/robots.txt
- sitemap.xml: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
- llms.txt: https://example.com/llms.txt
- llms-full.txt: https://example.com/llms-full.txt
